name: promiscuously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a lot of different sexual partners or sexual relationships: Some people enjoy promiscuously casual sex in later life. They spread their genes around by having sex promiscuously.
in a way that involves a lot of something, or a lot of different things: Millionaires and actors mingle together promiscuously. Germs develop resistance to antibiotics that are used promiscuously. See
promiscuous
More examplesFewer examplesHe lies shamelessly and promiscuously.History, ideology, and modern politics mix promiscuously.They promiscuously load all sorts of rubbish onto their computer and then wonder why it slows down.
